contact_name: European Commission, Secretariat General, Data Protection Officer

resources.description: A zip file with all CSV. One CSV per language. It can be opended with Excel easily.
resources.name: All CSV zipped

resources.description: A zip file with all RSS. RSS are grouped by language. Small groups can be joined and big broups can be splited.
resources.name: All RSS zipped

resources.description: RDF with all links to RSS and CSV of DPO
resources.name: RDF distribution

description: The Data Protection Officer is required to keep a register of all the processing operations on personal data carried out by the Institution which has appointed him/her.The Register, which must contain information explaining the purpose and conditions of all processing operations, is accessible to any interested person.In a spirit of transparency, the Commission has therefore decided to put its Register on-line, while making it clear that any person who doesn't have access to the Internet can inspect the register in the Commission's premises,  upon request to the Data Protection Officer of the Commission.
title: Register of the Data Protection Officer
name: sg-dpo
contact_address: Berlaymont 12/350, 200 Rue de la Loi, B-1049 Brussels, Belgium
rdf:
<rdf:RDF xmlns="http://open-data.europa.eu/ontologies/ec-odp-example#" xmlns:ecodp="http://open-data.europa.eu/ontologies/ec-odp#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:skos="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:skos-xl="http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#" xmlns:dcam="http://purl.org/dc/dcam/" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#">

	<dcat:Dataset rdf:about="http://ec.europa.eu/dpo-register">
		<ecodp:ckan-name>sg-dpo</ecodp:ckan-name>
        <dct:identifier>DPO</dct:identifier>
<dct:title xml:lang="en">Register of the Data Protection Officer</dct:title>
<dct:description xml:lang="en">The Data Protection Officer is required to keep a register of all the processing operations on personal data carried out by the Institution which has appointed him/her.The Register, which must contain information explaining the purpose and conditions of all processing operations, is accessible to any interested person.In a spirit of transparency, the Commission has therefore decided to put its Register on-line, while making it clear that any person who doesn't have access to the Internet can inspect the register in the Commission's premises,  upon request to the Data Protection Officer of the Commission.</dct:description>
<ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">Data Protection</ecodp:keyword>
<ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en"> Personal Data</ecodp:keyword>
<ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en"> European Commission</ecodp:keyword>
<ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en"> Secretariat General</ecodp:keyword>
<ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en"> DPO</ecodp:keyword>

		<dct:publisher rdf:resource="http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/corporate-body/SG"/>
		<dcat:distribution rdf:parseType="Resource">
			<dct:title xml:lang="en">RSS feed</dct:title>
			<dcat:accessURL rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI">https://ec.europa.eu/dgs/secretariat_general/tools/opendata/sg-dpo</dcat:accessURL>	
			<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat#WebService"/>    	
			<ecodp:distributionFormat>text/html</ecodp:distributionFormat>
			<dct:description xml:lang="en">1 RSS files and 1 CSV files</dct:description>
			<dct:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:modified>
			<dct:issued rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:issued>
		</dcat:distribution>
		<dcat:distribution rdf:parseType="Resource">
			<dct:title xml:lang="en">RDF distribution</dct:title>
			<dcat:accessURL rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI">https://ec.europa.eu/dgs/secretariat_general/tools/opendata/sg-dpo/SG-DPO.rdf</dcat:accessURL>
			<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat#Download"/>
			<ecodp:distributionFormat>application/rdf</ecodp:distributionFormat>
			<dct:description xml:lang="en">RDF with all links to RSS and CSV of DPO</dct:description>
			<dct:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:modified>
			<dct:issued rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:issued>
		</dcat:distribution>
		<dcat:distribution rdf:parseType="Resource">

			<dcat:accessURL rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI">https://ec.europa.eu/dgs/secretariat_general/tools/opendata/sg-dpo/SG-DPO-rss.zip</dcat:accessURL>
			<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat#Download"/>
			<ecodp:distributionFormat>application/zip</ecodp:distributionFormat>
			<dct:description xml:lang="en">A zip file with all RSS. RSS are grouped by language. Small groups can be joined and big broups can be splited.</dct:description>
			<dct:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:modified>
			<dct:issued rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:issued>
		</dcat:distribution>

			<dcat:accessURL rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI">https://ec.europa.eu/dgs/secretariat_general/tools/opendata/sg-dpo/SG-DPO-csv.zip</dcat:accessURL>
			<rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat#Download"/>
			<ecodp:distributionFormat>application/zip</ecodp:distributionFormat>
			<dct:description xml:lang="en">A zip file with all CSV. One CSV per language. It can be opended with Excel easily.</dct:description>
			<dct:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:modified>
			<dct:issued rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#Date">2015-07-29</dct:issued>
		</dcat:distribution>
